name: Rajalingham_Sohn_Jazayeri_MentalPong_NHP_DorsoMedialFrontalCortex
citation: Sohn, Hansem (2024) Rajalingham_Sohn_Jazayeri_MentalPong_NHP_DorsoMedialFrontalCortex (Version draft) [Data set]. DANDI archive. https://dandiarchive.org/dandiset/001208/draft
description: The dataset contains electrophysiology data recorded from the Dorso-Medial Frontal Cortex (DMFC) of two NHPs performing a mental pong task. The recording probes used were V-probe with 64 channels (manufactured by Plexon Inc.) or Neuropixel.
